headline: Coinbase and Mastercard in Advanced Talks to Acquire UK Stablecoin Firm BVNK
summary: Coinbase and Mastercard are reportedly in advanced talks to acquire London-based stablecoin firm BVNK, in what could become the largest stablecoin acquisition to date, according to Fortune. Key Takeaways: Coinbase and Mastercard are in advanced talks to acquire UK-based stablecoin firm BVNK. BVNK, founded in 2021, provides stablecoin infrastructure for ...

headline: Coinbase, Mastercard in advanced talks to buy $2B stablecoin firm
summary: The largest U.S. crypto exchange Coinbase (Nasdaq: COIN) and the payments giant Mastercard (NYSE: MA) are in advanced talks to acquire London-based stablecoin firm BVNK, Fortune reported. While no details are final, the acquisition would cost $1.5 billion to $2.5 billion, the report ...
